lore: A massive creature of living stone, Malphite struggles to impose blessed order on a chaotic world. Birthed as a servitor-shard to an otherworldly obelisk known as the Monolith, he used his tremendous elemental strength to maintain and protect his progenitor, but ultimately failed. The only survivor of the destruction that followed, Malphite now endures Runeterra's soft folk and their fluid temperaments, while struggling to find a new role worthy of the last of his kind.
title: Shard of the Monolith
blurb: A massive creature of living stone, Malphite struggles to impose blessed order on a chaotic world. Birthed as a servitor-shard to an otherworldly obelisk known as the Monolith, he used his tremendous elemental strength to maintain and protect his...
allytips: Armor naturally reduces the rate that attacks go through Granite Shield, so Brutal Strikes will strengthen the shield against physical damage.
Despite his abilities scaling on Armor, some games require Malphite to get Magic Resist. When those games occur, try getting Aegis of the Legion, Mercury's Treads, and Guardian Angel.

passive.name: Granite Shield
passive.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

enemytips: If you're a physical damage character stay behind your allies when fighting Malphite. Ground Slam can significantly reduce your damage output.
Malphite is one of a couple tanks who are capable of jungling. Watch out if he gets Smite.
name: Malphite

spells.name: Seismic Shard
spells.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
spells.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Brutal Strikes
spells.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
spells.sanitizedDescription: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}). While Granite Shield is active, this bonus is tripled to {{ f4.0 }}% ({{ f3 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}). While Granite Shield is active, this bonus is tripled to {{ f4.0 }}% ({{ f3 }}). Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

spells.name: Ground Slam
spells.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
spells.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

spells.name: Unstoppable Force
spells.description: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
spells.tooltip: Malphite charges to target area. Upon his arrival he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Malphite charges to target area. Upon his arrival he deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them into the air for {{ e3 }} seconds.
